abstract: The F.D.I.C. is said to be seeking a shake-up of Citigroup’s top management, including replacing Chief Executive Vikram Pandit, The Wall Street Journal reported.
snippet: The F.D.I.C. is said to be seeking a shake-up of Citigroup’s top management, including replacing Chief Executive Vikram Pandit, The Wall Street Journal reported.
lead_paragraph: The Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation is seeking a shake-up of  Citigroup‘s top management, including replacing the chief executive, Vikram S. Pandit, The Wall Street Journal reported, citing people familiar with the matter.

headline.main: F.D.I.C. Said to Eye Shake-Up at Citigroup
